about_the_game:
Tiny Hunters RPG is an action-packed RPG where you’ll venture into untamed lands, hunt fierce monsters, and gather resources to forge powerful gear. Explore diverse biomes, uncover hidden treasures, and challenge colossal beasts to become a legendary hunter.

Fish,  Craft and Hunt epic creatures: Your Town Awaits in Tiny Hunters RPG

⚔️ A Relaxing Simulation RPG game with engaging resource management and hours of entertainment.

🏝️ Beautiful Pixel Graphics and a soothing ambiance for a calming gameplay experience.

⚙️ Enjoy a satisfying progression system with strategic depth.

🌟 Skill Tree - gain permanent boosts, accelerating future growth and gameplay.

🦊 Efficiently manage your resources to optimize your economic development.

🔨 Forge tools to improve your hunting skills and overcome new challenges.

📦 Strategically plan your resource gathering to meet demands and improve efficiency.

⛏️ Discover and utilize items to enhance your gameplay experience.

🎒 Fully interactive Crafting and Inventory System for streamlined management.

🌟 Suitable for players of all ages seeking a relaxing yet engaging experience.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz Dual Core or faster
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Even slower systems run the game.
